briefTitle: A Single Session Intervention For Fear Of Recurrence In Breast Cancer Patients
officialTitle: A Single Session Intervention For Fear Of Recurrence In Breast Cancer Patients (The Mini AFTERc): A Controlled Trial
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* breast cancer patient completed treatment
* female

Exclusion Criteria:

* psychiatric illness
* cognitive deficit (e.g. dementia)
* no access to telephone
